titles.title: Crown Him with Many Crowns (Matthew Bridges/Godfrey Thring)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Crown Him with many crowns, The Lamb upon His throne. Hark how the heavenly anthem drowns All music but its own! Awake, my soul and sing Of Him who died for Thee; And hail Him as thy matchless King Through all eternity.{/lang-eng}
